title: How does singing reduce anxiety? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, it is a great way to distract yourself by trying to remember all the lyrics and trying to hit all the notes right with your voice. Plus, maybe you remember a fun time associated with the song. Bonus. I have to tell you that this does not work for me at all. Anxiety shortens my breath and makes me dizzy; singing was the first thing I thought of doing but it did not work for me at all. I do deep breathing instead.

YES, YES, and um…YES! Singing always puts me in a good mood whenever I do it. Especially since I do it well. Even if you don’t do it well, I’d assume it’s a VERY good way to unwind and let go of your stress.
